actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent Resolution disapproving the 5 percent ceiling on cost-of-living increases for Federal retirees.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that no legislation imposing a ceiling on Federal retirement cost-of-living increases be enacted.

titles.title: Concurrent Resolution disapproving the 5 percent ceiling on cost-of-living increases for Federal retirees.
